argument.description: A string in any character set that you want converted to an ASCII string in the database character set.

returnType: The ASCIISTR function returns a string value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL ASCIISTR function converts a string in any character set to an ASCII string using the database character set.
sample:
ASCIISTR('A B C Ä Ê')
Result: 'A B C \00C4 \00CA'

ASCIISTR('A B C Õ Ø')
Result: 'A B C \00D5 \00D8'

ASCIISTR('A B C Ä Ê Í Õ Ø')
Result: 'A B C \00C4 \00CA \00CD \00D5 \00D8'
